sentences.sContent: I hope my life to be colorful and valuable.
sentences.sContent_eng: I hope my life to be colorful and valuable.
sentences.sCn: 我希望我的生活是丰富多彩的和有价值的。

sentences.sContent: And he often finds his life so colorful and interesting as he overcomes all the difficulties.
sentences.sContent_eng: And he often finds his life so colorful and interesting as he overcomes all the difficulties.
sentences.sCn: 他经常觉得他的生活是丰富多彩和有趣的，因为他克服了所有的困难。

sentences.sContent: Because of her hard working, her garden was so colorful.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of her hard working, her garden was so colorful.
sentences.sCn: 因为她的努力，她的花园是如此的丰富多彩。

synos.tran: 华美的；有趣的；富有色彩的

words.tran: 有色的；着色的；有色人种的
无色的；苍白的；无趣味的
着色；着色剂；配色；天然色；外貌
把...染色，粉饰，脸红（color的过去时和过去分词形式）

trans.tranCn: 富有色彩的； 有趣的
